_header: This is the will that God is in
Subjects: sermons, verse in; sins, deadly; penance; God, will of
_description: God’s wish that man be pure — one couplet in a Latin sermon

CULIi38.Transcription:
þis is þe wylle þat god is Inneþat ȝe be
                    clene of dedlyche synne
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 70.
